dir-section.heading: Local Government
dir-section.p: There are 265 municipalities, each with a municipal council, elected for a period of four years. The Governor of each oblast is appointed by the Council of Ministers.

address.verbatim-address: 2300 Pernik, ul. Sveti Ivan Rilski 1 b
6000 Stara Zagora, bul. Tsar Simeon Veliki 108
